name: responsive-addons
description: Responsive addons for xs, sm, md, lg sizes

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p css && postcss index.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-custom-properties -u autoprefixer -o css/responsive-addons.css

author: Prank <meetprank@gmail.com> (https://lovubuntu.github.io/)
